content: bobble´s bag -english version pattern created and crocheted by isabel salgueiro aka zzabelinha sintra 13/10/08 translation 26/10/08 materials 7 balls of acrylic yarn 50gr/ 120mt 1 crochet hook nº6 6mm 1 tapestry needle gauge 10x10 cm=10stitchesx10rows instructions front side make 2 chain 17 work with two yarns together* row 1 you will work in half a round* single_crochet across the first 15 chains increase 1 chain in the next 5 chains continue with 16sc 1 chain turn row-2 15 single_crochet insert hook in the back loop* increase 1 chain in the next 5 chain continue in single_crochet 1 chain and turn row-3 16 single_crochet **insert the hook in the front loop of the chain 5 increases in the next stitches 16 single_crochet 1 chain turn row-4 2 single_crochet 1 bobble**yo pull the yarn repeat more 2 times work all stitches in the hook together ** insert the hook two row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end row 5 and all the odd single_crochet work in the back loop of each stitches row 6 2 single_crochet 1 bobble**yo pull the yarn repeat more 2 times work all stitches in the hook together ** insert the hook two row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end row8 2 single_crochet 1 bobble**yo pull the yarn repeat more 2 times work all stitches in the hook together ** insert the hook two row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end row 10 2 single_crochet 1 bobble**yo pull the yarn repeat more 2 times work all stitches in the hook together ** insert the hook two row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 4sc 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end row 12 2 single_crochet 1 bobble**yo pull the yarn repeat more 2 times work all stitches in the hook together ** insert the hook two row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end row 14 2
